name: MGCM Combat Edition
description:
[Game overview]
A secondary creation fighting game which you can battle with attractive characters, magical girls, and demons from "I Am Magicami".
The player becomes their partner "Omnis" and gives precise instructions to the fighting girls!

[Notice]
- Modification and secondary use of game data is prohibited.
- Magicami Fighting Game Club cannot be held responsible for any problems that occur while playing this game.

[Story overview]
The group of magical girls finally accepted the Seven Demon Lords of Erebos. As they deepen their friendship, Luxria, the Demon Load of Lust, proposes holding a fighting tournament in order to know each other's strengths and improve their cooperativeness.
The winner will be presented with an exceptional reward, any wish that Luxria's magic could grant. Then the MGCMCE (Magi Cami Cooperative Elimination) was held here.
However, when players are progressing smoothly, surprisingly The Cacodemon Emerges!

* Initial 12 magical girls + 7 demons can be used!
A large volume of playable characters, that you can choose from 19 + 1 girls from the beginning! DLC characters will also coming soon!

* Operation system can be enjoyed from beginners to advanced users!
- Attack is the basic 3 buttons of A, B, and C!
- There are simple commands that can be used with one button for throwing, skills (special moves), etc.!
- By pressing the D button, you can use the high-performance evasive technique "Flux Evasion" on the ground and in the air!
- Enjoy an exhilarating attack with 4 types of jumps that are abundant and highly flexible!
- "Auto Rush Combo" that connects attacks from skills to Magi Kami Skills (super moves) with a series of short-range A attacks!
- There is also "Babel Chain Combo" that easily connects normal moves with character-specific routes such as A > B > C!
- Let's seize victory by unleashing flashy magic such as Magi Kami Skills and True Power using the "possibility gauge"!


* Battle type corresponding to various proclivities!
From clean standard characters to samurai-like one-shot characters, high-speed combo characters, high-risk high-reward gamblers, barrage shooters, throwing characters, and installation characters, we have a wide variety of tactical types that no one character is the same. You will surely find a character that suits your taste.

* A wide range of battles are possible from 1 to 1, to 4 to 4 team battles!
You can use one of your favorite characters, or you can also have fun with all the characters you care about!

* Supports local/net battles!
While chatting with your friends, enjoy a great match!
***To enable network matches, you need to open ports or use VPN software.

* Full mode for one person!
In addition to the arcade mode story, you can hone your skills through training, and once you've gained strength, you can also train in high-level end contents such as survival and boss rushes! Aim for a high score by defeating the demon lords who show their seriousness as bosses!
***To change difficulty level, access OPTIONS > Game settings > Difficulty level.

* This game has been officially approved by the management of "I Am Magicami", but it is only a derivative work, and the management of "I Am Magicami" is not involved in this game. Please refrain from making inquiries about this game to the "I Am Magicami" management.
